comment:
Extracted Variables:
- Let \( x \) be the number of new model furnaces to be purchased.
- Let \( y \) be the number of old model furnaces to be purchased.

Definitions:
- \( x \geq 5 \): At least 5 new model furnaces should be used.
- \( y \leq 0.35(x+y) \): At most 35% of the furnaces can be the old model.
- \( 10x + 15y \geq 200 \): The high rise needs to heat at least 200 apartments.
- \( 200x + 250y \leq 3500 \): The high rise has 3500 kWh of electricity available.

Objective:
- Minimize \( x + y \): Total number of furnaces to be purchased.
